translations: 楼梯；<英>（尤指中小学和大学建筑物中的）楼梯间

sentences.sentence: He groped his way up the staircase in the dark.
She was sitting on the bottom step of the staircase.
sentences.translation: 她正坐在最下面一磴楼梯上。

sentences.sentence: The house has a superb staircase made from oak and marble.
sentences.translation: 这座房子里有用栎木和大理石做成的一流的楼梯。
